1: -module(mylib_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("proper/include/proper.hrl").
    7: 
    8: all() ->
    9:     [run_manually_crafted_property].
   10: 
   11: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   12:     [{'start', 5}, {'end', 10}, {expected, ok} | Config].
   13: 
   14: test_mylib() ->
   15:     [{userdata,[{doc,"Testing the mylib module"}]}].
   16: 
   17: test_mylib(_Config) ->
   18:     {skip,"Not implemented."}.
   19: 
   20: manually_crafted_property(C) ->
   21:     ?FORALL(X, integer(?config('start', C), ?config('end', C)),
   22:             mylib:my_fun(X) =:= ?config(expected, C)).
